div.div:
$NOTES
The program is designed to differentiate between short presses and long presses.
Button 1:
- Long Press - Power On/Off
- Short Press - Up event
Button 2:
- Long Press - Select next mode (e.g. Volume, Brightness, Channel)
- Short Press - Down event

div.div: Simple button debouncing state machine that also detects long presses.

switch.text: Simple button debouncing state machine that also...

div.div: This single diagram has two state machines in it. The button statemachine sends events (outside the diagram) to the TvRemoteSm.

switch.text: This single diagram has two state machines in it. The button...

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe flex-start; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 488px; height: 1px; padding-top: 7px; margin-left: 552px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 14px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; overflow-wrap: normal;

div.div:
TV Remote state machine that peforms the following:
Press and hold
Button1
to transition all the way to TV_OFF state from any other.
Press and hold
Button2
to toggle the mode while in the TV_ON state.
Press
Button1
to increase the active field (i.e. Volume, Channel, etc).
Press
Button2
to decrese the active field (i.e. Volume, Channel, etc).

switch.text: TV Remote state machine that peforms the following:...

a.text: Text is not SVG - cannot display
